job_description: Machine Vision & Robotics Software Development. Technology Brewing is a robotics and visions systems integrator located in Salmon Arm, BC where the quality of life and outdoor activities are among the best in the world. Our team is committed to bringing products from the drawing board to market and provides engineering and product development services that turn vision into reality and add value for our clients.Join our small team to work on real world projects for your summer and fall work term. This opportunity is posted as a four or eight month co-op, we do prefer candidates who are available for a double work term (i.e. 8 months).www.techbrew.com/
